attributes.review: I downloaded this app and immediately got a sore throat. About 30 minutes later, I began to sweat as my temperature rose to over 102 degrees. I contacted support and they urged me not to worry and it would, at some point, just go away. I have since deleted the app and feel better now
attributes.title: Dangerous app

attributes.review: This app is just terrible too many things wrong with it that I can’t even explain. Please take it off the App Store it would do us all a favor🥰
attributes.title: Just stop ❤️
